price: Ya ce: "Kamar wancan Ubangijinki Ya ce. Shĩ, a gare Ni mai sauƙi* ne. Kuma dõmin Mu sanya shi wata alãma ga mutãne, kuma wata rahama ce daga gare Mu.' Kuma abin yã kasance wani al'amari hukuntacce."
arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ هُوَ عَلَيَّ هَيِّنٞۖ وَلِنَجۡعَلَهُۥٓ ءَايَةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ وَرَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّاۚ وَكَانَ أَمۡرٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا
footnotes: * Malã'ikin da ya je ga Maryama a cikin sũrar mutum jibrĩlu ne Yã hũra a cikin wuyan rĩgarta, sai ta yi ciki da Ĩsa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

translations: and so that We will make him
